refnamediv.refpurpose: Get a simplexml_element object from a DOM node.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function takes a node of a DOM document and makes it into a SimpleXML node. This new object can then be used as a native SimpleXML element. If any errors occur, it returns &false;.

example.title: Import DOM
example.programlisting:
<?php
$dom = new domDocument;
$dom->loadXML('<books><book><title>blah</title></book></books>');
if (!$dom) {
    echo 'Error while parsing the document';
    exit;
}

$s = simplexml_import_dom($dom);

echo $s->book[0]->title; // blah
?>
